subject: Playoff Games
Baseball
lead_paragraph: To avoid a collapse, the Tampa Bay Rays need to beat a Boston Red Sox team that looks as if they’re swatting a mosquito off their forearms on their stroll to the World Series.
snippet: To avoid a collapse, the Tampa Bay Rays need to beat a Boston Red Sox team that looks as if they’re swatting a mosquito off their forearms on their stroll to the World Series.
